title: Always Warm
overview: The up-and-coming painter Wen Qian was surprised by Bai Jiran, the lead singer of the bar resident band, and invited Bai Jiran to be her model. She tried both hard and soft but was repeatedly rejected. At the order of her father, Wen Qian went to Wenshu Monastery in Chengdu to collect a piece of his mother's collection and sent it back to the UK.
